name: ljswitchboard-project_manager
description: Orchestrate the modules that comprise LabJack's "Kipling" program.

scripts.checkout_master: node main.js do -- git checkout master
scripts.git_status:
node main.js --no-summary_out -i '^## master...origin/master
$' --ignore_message="up to date" do -c "git status --short --branch"
scripts.setup_core: node main.js --which=core do -- npm install && npm dedupe
scripts.setup: node main.js do -- npm install && npm dedupe
scripts.setup_core_dev: node main.js --which=core do -- npm install && npm dedupe
scripts.setup_core_dist: node main.js --which=core do -- npm install --production && npm dedupe
scripts.update: node main.js do -- npm update && npm dedupe
